name: Clockodile Creek
description:
UE4 Megajam 2020

It's been 30 years and Hunter Hector is back in Laernu Creek looking for the elusive beast that stole his grandad's prized antique clock. A support crew is also en-route bringing supplies but, well... we haven't heard from them for a few hours so you'll have to find your own equipment.

How To Play —

Search for supplies along the creek, then draw the 'clockodile' out using bait. Once you have a bite, knock it out with explosives. She's a big girl so you'll probably have to give it a few tries. Once you have the clock, make it back to the boathouse! Your boat will take damage from the occasional bump and croc bite, so make sure it gets fixed up at the dock before you end up in deep water. 

Controls —

Keyboard/mouse

W/S - Forward

A/D Turn

Q/E - Swap Item

F/LMB - Throw

Shift - Boost

Space - Jump

Gamepad

LT/RT - Forward

Left Thumbstick - Turn

LS/RS - Swap Item

Face Button Top  - Throw

Face Button Right - Boost

Face Button Bottom - Jump

R - Restart

ESC - Exit


Latest Build —

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LP2wYC2-OotbYf3Tk4_ORjDmpeNc1vZ3/view?usp=shari...

I always try my best to create a good experience but when it comes down to the wire sometimes sneaky bugs slip through. So, if you had a difficult time with the jam build, feel free to download this. The croc is no longer near invulnerable and performance troubles have been addressed. It's a much better experience overall. Enjoy!
